question: Which of the following was the Peshwa during the reign of Rajaram?
explanation: Ramchandra Pant Amatya who was the Peshwa during the reign of Rajaram from 1689 CE to 1708 CE. When Rajaram had to escape to Ginjee in 1689 CE, he gave the Hukumat Panha to Ramchandra Pant Amatya before leaving.
